title: Goblet, ca. 1820–30
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltd, London (by gift of Martin C.F. Mortimer); 1966 WPW, NY
description: 3-part blown molded; straignt flaring sides, tall stem with central knop, wipde flat circular foot, molded pattern of diamonds with blazes above and vertical fluting below; ground pontil mark below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Goblet, ca. 1820–30.
ca. 1820–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-197.
